Interface RampMeter

All Superinterfaces:
ControllerIO, Device, SonarObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
RampMeterImpl
public interface RampMeter extends Device
A ramp meter is a traffic signal which meters the flow of traffic on a freeway entrance ramp.
Author:
Douglas Lau
